Name: The Last Spark
About the game: Spark has awakened in the robot cemetery of an old, overgrown, and abandoned factory. The robots around him have lost their power and rest in an unending slumber. Armed with nothing but his base-model body, Spark sets out to re-awaken the factory and his fellow robots. Puzzle-platformer styles! - Jump, swing, and be lifted to different areas of the factory in order to complete the puzzles that keep the factory in its slumbering state! - Grab upgrades for Spark to help him traverse his environment! - Collect hidden gears - collect all 22!
